children.text: A number of the walls have not been properly fixed into the concrete slab.
t is a requirement of Australian Standard AS 1684 Residential Timber-Framed Construction, clause 9.5 Nominal Fixings (Minimum Fixings) that
‘The minimum required fixing of bottom plates to concrete slab is one 75mm masonry nail at not more than 1200mm centres’.
The fixing of all the bottom plates must be rectified in compliance with the above.
